xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:title: XCCDF Benchmark That References the Validation Content for the partition_test
xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:description: This XCCDF Benchmark references the OVAL Definitions in the validation content for the partition_test.

xccdf:metadata.dc:contributor: National Institute of Standards and Technology
xccdf:metadata.dc:publisher: National Institute of Standards and Technology
xccdf:metadata.dc:creator: National Institute of Standards and Technology

xccdf:Profile.xccdf:title: XCCDF Profile That References the Validation Content for the partition_test
xccdf:Profile.xccdf:description: This Profile allows for the tailoring of the validation content for the partition_test.

metadata.title: Test the device entity with the equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the device entity properly supports the equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the device equals /dev/sda.

metadata.description: Make sure the device entity properly supports the not equal operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the device matches the regular expression /dev/sd[\w]+.
